articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Delegation of Russian Company
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju met with the delegation of the GAZPROM Company of Russia headed by Chairman of its Management Aleksei Miller, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today and had a friendly talk with it.
 On hand were Jong Chol Yun, vice-minister of Oil Industry, and Kim Yong Jae, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other officials concerned and Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Company Delegation Winds Up Its Visit to DPRK
Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Company Delegation Winds Up Its Visit to DPRK
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the GAZPROM Company of Russia led by Chairman of its Management Aleksei Miller flew back home Friday after winding up its 2-day visit to the DPRK.
 During its stay the delegation visited Mangyongdae where there is the old home of President Kim Il Sung and the Tower of the Juche Idea and laid a wreath in the name of the chairman of the company's management before the Liberation Tower.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Unit
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Aleksei Miller, chairman of the management of the Russian GAZPROM Company.
 It was handed today to Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, by the chairman of the management.
